title: Connect swiftsportshub.com Custom Domain and Finalize Deployment Docs

requirements.text: Fix and complete the mainnet + custom domain deployment documentation in frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md by replacing the broken/unfinished code fence with a fully formatted, step-by-step guide that includes: deploying backend+frontend to IC mainnet, where/how to set VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_BASE_URL=https://swiftsportshub.com, and the steps needed to connect the custom domain swiftsportshub.com (DNS + IC domain configuration) so the site is reachable at https://swiftsportshub.com.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md contains no broken or unfinished markdown code fences.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md includes explicit instructions to set VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_BASE_URL=https://swiftsportshub.com (noting normalization/no trailing slash).
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md includes explicit, actionable steps for custom domain setup for swiftsportshub.com (including DNS records and the IC-side domain configuration steps).

requirements.text: Update frontend/LIVE_URLS.md so it can be used as the single source of truth after going live: document the final custom domain URL (https://swiftsportshub.com) and the fallback IC boundary URL, and provide clear instructions to replace placeholders ([FRONTEND_CANISTER_ID], [BACKEND_CANISTER_ID]) and update the status fields after deployment/domain activation.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/LIVE_URLS.md clearly describes both the custom domain URL and the fallback IC boundary URL format.
frontend/LIVE_URLS.md includes explicit instructions for maintainers to replace canister ID placeholders and update status fields after deployment.

requirements.text: Ensure all absolute URL generation in the frontend that may reference the public site domain uses the centralized utility in frontend/src/utils/publicSiteBaseUrl.ts (and thus respects VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_BASE_URL=https://swiftsportshub.com) rather than hardcoding swiftsportshub.com or using window.location.origin directly.
acceptanceCriteria: No frontend code introduces new hardcoded references to swiftsportshub.com for absolute URL generation when getPublicSiteBaseUrl()/getPublicSiteHostname() would be appropriate.
The build-time override VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_BASE_URL continues to be the documented mechanism for setting the production public domain.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep all backend logic in the single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo); introduce backend/migration.mo only if state upgrades are required.
nonGoals: Performing or automating the actual DNS registrar changes for swiftsportshub.com (documentation and configuration guidance only).
Adding new product features unrelated to custom domain connection and deployment documentation.
